January 4, 1928.
Dear Miss Carter:
div1.p:
Your letter of January 2nd with your check
for $66.40 has been received, and I am transmitting it
to the Comptroller.

I am very sorry to learn of your sickness, and
hope that you will soon be entirely well.

Dr. Russell is not expected back until about
the end of January. He will be sorry to learn of your
illness.
div1.closer:
Very sincerely yours, W.A. Sawyer Miss Laura A. Carter
